T02D3703:337a-3: mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos /
T02D3703:337a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' lding la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3703:337a-5: kha sbyar mchu bar sprul ni bsdams pa yis //
T02D3703:337a-6: gdengs ka'i nor bu mkha' lding me long ste //
T02D3703:337a-7: rang bzhin 'od gsal gnyug ma'i gzugs mthong ngo //
T02D3703:337a-8: khro ba spangs pa de na rgyal gyur cig / mkha' lding bstan bcos skyed mos tshal nas ni //
T02D3703:337a-9: me tog rtsi yi sbrang rtsi de nyid ni //
T02D3703:337a-10: sems can don du sbrang rtsi byed pa yi //
T02D3703:337a-11: dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis 'dir de bsdu //
T02D3703:337a-12: gang zhig brtan pa'i sems kyis bla ma yi //
T02D3703:337a-13: rjes 'jug dag pa'i lam la yang dag gnas //
T02D3703:337a-14: mi de phrin las ma lus pa yi ni //
T02D3703:337a-15: dngos grub thams cad kyi ni snod du 'gyur //
T02D3703:337a-16: bzod dka'i dug las byung ba'i tshor ba yis //
T02D3703:337a-17: 'khrugs pa'i 'gro ba'i srog ni 'dzin byed cing //
T02D3703:337a-18: chos dang nor dang 'dod dang thar pa ni //
T02D3703:337a-19: bsod nams byas pa'i 'gro ba de yis 'thob //
T02D3703:337a-20: 'gro ba'i don phyir mkha' lding bstan bcos ni //
T02D3703:337a-21: dam pa'i skye bo de yis bsngags par byed //
T02D3703:337a-22: 'dod pa can ni nor gyis dga' ba ltar //
T02D3703:337a-23: sngags pas sprul gdug mi bzad pa yis so ;
T02D3703:337a-24: / de nas gdengs ka can dang tsi ti rnams //
T02D3703:337a-25: r'a yi dkyil 'khor can dang 'dren gzugs sogs //
T02D3703:337a-26: rlung gi yon tan dus dang dus min dang //
T02D3703:337a-27: aa ma ratta sbyor rlung bus pa'o //
T02D3703:337a-28: mkha' lding gis bshad sman gyi nus pa dang //
T02D3703:337a-29: ji ltar dug 'joms pa yi rim pa dag / gus pas de ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon //
T02D3703:337a-30: gzhan dag kyang ni thos pa las byung ba'i //
T02D3703:337a-32: tri na aindra n'i la lta bu'i lus //
T02D3703:337a-33: 'dab brgya rgyas 'dra'i mtshan pa lhag ma can //
T02D3703:337a-34: nor rgyas lus ni kha dog dkar po la //
T02D3703:337a-35: mtshan pa padma rgyas 'dra sngon po yin //
T02D3703:337a-36: shar thogs nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu la //
T02D3703:337a-37: mgo la g-yung drung dung chen 'jog pa'o //
T02D3703:337a-38: karko ta ni mun pa lta bu yi //
T02D3703:337a-39: ri mo gsum ni mgrin par yod pa yin //
T02D3703:337a-40: padma'i lus ni kha dog ljang gu la //
T02D3703:337a-41: skar tshogs lta bu'i thig les gdengs ka mdzes //
T02D3703:337a-42: pad chen zla 'od bskus pa lta bu la //
T02D3703:337b-0: mdung rtse @337b gsum pa lta bu gdengs ka yin //
T02D3703:337b-1: dung skyong ka ni ya ra'i me tog 'dra //
T02D3703:337b-2: mgrin par zla ba'i cha yis mtshan pa yin //
T02D3703:337b-3: rigs ldan gyi ni spyi bo'i gdengs ka dag / du ba lta bu'i zla ba phyed pa yin //
T02D3703:337b-4: dbyig pa yis ni brdegs pa mchog yin te //
T02D3703:337b-5: klu rnams bzung nas skrod pa de ltar min //
T02D3703:337b-6: sdang bas glags ni tshol bar byed pa na //
T02D3703:337b-7: sngags pa dag ni gang gis thar bar byed //
T02D3703:337b-8: sa 'og gnas na yongs su gnas pa yi //
T02D3703:337b-9: dbang chen 'og ni klu rnams shin tu dkon //
T02D3703:337b-10: gdengs ka'i nor bus mdzes par byas pa yi //
T02D3703:337b-11: khol po yang ni glog gi zer ma 'dra //
T02D3703:337b-12: lce gnyis gdengs can phud ces 'jigs pa'i sgra //
T02D3703:337b-13: rin po che ni med par gyur pa ste //
T02D3703:337b-14: khol po yi yang khol po'i gnas su ni //
T02D3703:337b-15: gus pa med pa'i lto 'phye dag yin no //
T02D3703:337b-16: aa ku ba sam gnyis gnyis bram ze rgyal //
T02D3703:337b-17: me tog dang ni s'a la'i dri yin no //
T02D3703:337b-18: de bzhin sta ma ka pa rje'u dang dmangs //
T02D3703:337b-19: mar dang nya yi dri ni bro ba yin //
T02D3703:337b-20: dung 'chang mche ba'i rtsa na legs gnas pa //
T02D3703:337b-21: sbrang rtsi'i me tog phreng ba lta bu yin //
T02D3703:337b-22: de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rmongs byed kyi //
T02D3703:337b-23: dug ste yongs su 'dzag par gyur pas so //
T02D3703:337b-24: gdengs ka can ni rang gi ngo bo'o//
T02D3703:337b-25: ganda ya na'i yin par gyur na ni //
T02D3703:337b-26: mgo mjug lus la ri mo kyog po yod //
T02D3703:337b-27: gdengs kas dman no 'jig rten ganda ya //
T02D3703:337b-28: tsi ti zhes ni yongs su grags pa yin //
T02D3703:337b-29: de yis bzung na g-yo med skad cig gis //
T02D3703:337b-30: de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin //
T02D3703:337b-31: de nyid grub pa thob pas gal te na //
T02D3703:337b-32: sad par byed na dran pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:337b-34: thig btab lta bu'i ri mo ring mo can //
T02D3703:337b-35: banda ya ru rnam par shes par bya //
T02D3703:337b-36: shing dang lcug 'khyil rtsas gtugs yod par ni //
T02D3703:337b-37: nges par shin tu legs gnas r'a yi la la //
T02D3703:337b-38: kha skom mig dmar zas dang stan mi 'dod //
T02D3703:337b-39: tsha dang 'khru ba yi ni rjes la brgyal //
T02D3703:337b-40: dkar dang dmar dang nag dang ljang gu yi //
T02D3703:337b-41: ri mo med pa yin no r'a yil la //
T02D3703:337b-42: btso ma'i gser 'dra'i lus ldan de yis ni //
T02D3703:337b-43: 'gro ba rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed yin //
T02D3703:337b-44: r'a yil gyis ni bzung na nges bar ni //
T02D3703:338a-1: khyab par skrangs pa kho nar 'gyur //
T02D3703:338a-2: gser mdog lus de rgyu ba'i tshe na ni //
T02D3703:338a-3: 'bar ba'i me lce chad pas 'od ma bsreg /'od ma'i rang bzhin yang ni des bsreg na //
T02D3703:338a-4: de yis bzung na ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:338a-5: r'a yil la'i rang bzhin no /
T02D3703:338a-7: // / chu dang rlung me sa yi rang bzhin gyi //
T02D3703:338a-8: ko ta rnams kyi gang zhig mtshan pa ni //
T02D3703:338a-9: go med sa rnams su ni shes par bya //
T02D3703:338a-10: dug chen skrangs 'bur yang dag skyed pa po //
T02D3703:338a-11: chu yi dkyil 'khor can ni dug 'dzin gyis //
T02D3703:338a-12: zin pa'i mtshan nyid lus ni 'drul ba yin //
T02D3703:338a-13: tsha dang 'dar dang skam dang skrang ba ni //
T02D3703:338a-14: rlung gi lus can gyis ni skyed par byed //
T02D3703:338a-15: lus kun gyi ni spu yi rtsa ba nas //
T02D3703:338a-16: se ba gnag 'dra'i brag gi thigs pa 'byung //
T02D3703:338a-17: me yis reg pas kun nas skyed pa ni //
T02D3703:338a-18: thos dang gzugs dang mthong bas nyams pa yin //
T02D3703:338a-19: sa yi dkyil 'khor can gyis smas pa na //
T02D3703:338a-20: skrang dang tsha ba'i reg pas gdungs pa yin //
T02D3703:338a-21: gnyid dang stan dag la ni sdang bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:338a-22: skyes bu sems la zug gzer dag gis nyen //
T02D3703:338a-23: phung po la ni myur du snad gyur pa //
T02D3703:338a-24: ring po yi ni ring por skrang pa ste //
T02D3703:338a-25: nges pa nyid du mang pos mang po'o //
T02D3703:338a-26: thal ba dang ni rus pa bshang ba'am /
T02D3703:338a-27: gzhan yang lus las gang zhig byung ba yis //
T02D3703:338a-28: go med sa rnams kyis ni myur nyid du //
T02D3703:338a-29: 'gro ba rnams kyi lus ni nyams par byed //
T02D3703:338a-30: gang zhig stobs can yang ni la la dag / mgo mjug tu yang mes mtshan med pa dang //
T02D3703:338a-31: yud tsam gyis ni 'chi ba de yis 'dzin //
T02D3703:338a-32: des ni 'gro ba 'chi bar the tshom med //
T02D3703:338a-33: 'dir ni mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos //
T02D3703:338a-34: des na snying po dang du blang bar bgyi //
T02D3703:338a-35: sngags dang sman dang sbyor ba gang yin pa //
T02D3703:338a-36: ji srid dbugs rgyu'i bar du bya ba yin //
T02D3703:338a-37: dkyil 'khor can gyi rang bzhin no /
T02D3703:338a-39: // / gang zhig dran pa'i dug gis phye ba na //
T02D3703:338a-40: bram ze yin par gyur na de ni dkar //
T02D3703:338a-41: dmar po rgyal rigs ser po rje'u rigs yin //
T02D3703:338a-42: dmangs rigs nag po 'di de rnams la'o //
T02D3703:338a-43: gang zhig bya rog rkang 'dra'i mdud pa dang //
T02D3703:338a-44: phye na ri mo 'khyog po snang ba la //
T02D3703:338a-45: mi mnyam thig les rnam par spras pa ni //
T02D3703:338b-0: nges par nag po @338b brtsegs pa dag dang mtshungs //
T02D3703:338b-1: gzhan du bcud kyis len ni bsgrub pa la //
T02D3703:338b-2: bram ze 'am ni de bzhin rgyal rigs kyis //
T02D3703:338b-3: rje'u rigs kyi ni mdze nad gzhom pa la //
T02D3703:338b-4: gsod pa la ni dmangs rigs rung bar bya //
T02D3703:338b-6: smad 'tshong sems kyis dor thabs kyis sems bzhin //
T02D3703:338b-7: bdag rgyun mi 'chad rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub //
T02D3703:338b-8: mkhas pas de bzhin rlung gi yon tan gyis //
T02D3703:338b-9: dus ni nges par shes pa kho na yin //
T02D3703:338b-10: srog chags rnams ni gang gis 'tsho ba dang //
T02D3703:338b-11: khyad can gang zhig nyams pas srog 'gro'o //
T02D3703:338b-12: don dam zhing brtson de la sems dang ni //
T02D3703:338b-13: bdag dang mchog dang de nyid du ni 'dod //
T02D3703:338b-14: 'jug pa'i rang bzhin srog ni kha ba yi //
T02D3703:338b-15: 'od la brten pas gsal por skyed par byed //
T02D3703:338b-16: bdag dang skyes bu'i rang bzhin de nyid ni //
T02D3703:338b-17: nyi ma'i zhing la brten na sdud par byed //
T02D3703:338b-18: snying stobs rdul dang mun par babs pa na //
T02D3703:338b-19: dug brgyal dge dang the tshom mi dge yi //
T02D3703:338b-20: ston par byed de rlung gi dbye ba dag //
T02D3703:338b-21: 'jug dang gnas dang 'byung ba nyid na'o //
T02D3703:338b-22: gtso bor chos sems pa na snying stobs te //
T02D3703:338b-23: yul la chags na de bzhin rdul la srog / rmongs pa la zhen mun pas 'gog pa yis //
T02D3703:338b-24: gsal por cha ni shes par gyur pa yin //
T02D3703:338b-25: 'byung ban ni 'byung ba kho na ste //
T02D3703:338b-26: 'jug pa na ni 'jug pa ston par byed //
T02D3703:338b-27: rang gi gnyug ma'i lus la de bzhin du //
T02D3703:338b-28: kun du grong khyer gzhan la'ang de bzhin no //
T02D3703:338b-29: zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i zhing du rlung //
T02D3703:338b-30: rgyu ba'i phyogs su pho nya gnas na ni //
T02D3703:338b-31: dug gis brgyal ba de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:338b-32: de bzhin stong pa'i khyim la 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:338b-33: nyi ma'i zhing la rlung ni gnas pa na //
T02D3703:338b-34: gsal por pho nyas thad kar bltas pa dang //
T02D3703:338b-35: skyes bu rgyab nas 'dug ste yin na ni //
T02D3703:338b-36: nges par zla ba'i khyim la bzang por gzung //
T02D3703:338b-37: dug zhir 'gro dang bya ba gang la yang ;
T02D3703:338b-38: / zla ba'i srog gi zas 'khrig 'thab mo la //
T02D3703:338b-39: nyi ma'i srog ni mdzes so bi su la //
T02D3703:338b-40: bab na rdul gyis char ni gzung bar bya //
T02D3703:338b-41: grub pa gzhan dag gsungs pa gnyis ka yang //
T02D3703:338b-42: zhing du srog gi rlung ni legs par gnas //
T02D3703:338b-43: dbye ba rnam pa bzhir ni yod pa la //
T02D3703:339a-2: khyab dang steng 'og dbus su rlung dang ni //
T02D3703:339a-3: yon tan zhi dang lha yi bdag po na //
T02D3703:339a-4: don med 'khyam dang 'thab dang 'chi ba ni //
T02D3703:339a-5: dri khur de yis de rnams byed pa yin //
T02D3703:339a-6: skom dang bkres dang skyo ba dag dang ni //
T02D3703:339a-7: 'dod pa'i dgos pa nyams pa rtse gsum gyi //
T02D3703:339a-8: 'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i dge bskyed pa //
T02D3703:339a-9: mi 'chi med na de byed yin ma yin //
T02D3703:339a-10: gzhan don byed na dka' ba med par ni //
T02D3703:339a-11: bder gnas bde skyed yid ni tshim par byed //
T02D3703:339a-12: dri med dri zhim la ni mngon 'dod bzhin //
T02D3703:339a-13: gzugs bzang lha yi bdag po de yis byed //
T02D3703:339a-14: yi dags mi dang rig 'dzin sgo dang ni //
T02D3703:339a-15: gnod sbyin sgo gang lag pa gnyis kyis sdom //
T02D3703:339a-16: don dam thig le gang yin de dag ni //
T02D3703:339a-17: zla cha rtse sprod dbus gnas mtshon par byed //
T02D3703:339a-18: nag dang li khri dung dang gser sbyangs mdog //
T02D3703:339a-19: don gang yin pa de ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D3703:339a-20: gang dag brjod pas dri khur rab dbye las //
T02D3703:339a-21: mnyan pa de dag rab tu thob par byed //
T02D3703:339a-22: mig dang kha sbyor ji lta bzhin du smra //
T02D3703:339a-23: dbugs 'jug 'byung ba kun nas ma nyams na //
T02D3703:339a-24: snying stobs la ni bab pa'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D3703:339a-25: rnam 'gyur med pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D3703:339a-26: mig gi sbubs ni cung zad phye ba dang //
T02D3703:339a-27: rma can cung zad so yi phreng ba rnams ;
T02D3703:339a-28: / rmi lam bzhin du dug gi reg pa yis //
T02D3703:339a-29: g-yengs pas 'gags pa de ni rdul la yin //
T02D3703:339a-30: rma can gyi ni kha gdangs mig kyang bgrang //
T02D3703:339a-31: gsus pa 'jigs su rung ba spos pa dang //
T02D3703:339a-32: sen mo so dang mig rnams mdog 'gyur ba //
T02D3703:339a-33: gsar po ra ti mi yi mdog gi nyal //
T02D3703:339a-34: gang dag la ni lag pas drangs tsam gyis //
T02D3703:339a-35: rtsa nas bud do mgo la skyes pa'i dgra //
T02D3703:339a-36: 'byung po'i pha ni gang yin de song la //
T02D3703:339a-37: de la the tshom yang ni dgos sam ci //
T02D3703:339a-38: 'thungs pa de yi mod la ldog byed de //
T02D3703:339a-39: sman dang chu ni ming dag gang yin la //
T02D3703:339a-40: srog de'i mdun du rgyug par byed pa ste//
T02D3703:339a-41: g-yog 'khor gyi ni skyes bu ji bzhin no //
T02D3703:339a-42: so rtsa'i bdud rtsi zhim po ma yin dang //
T02D3703:339a-43: rna ba'i sgra med mig gi glog kyang med //
T02D3703:339a-44: skyes bu gang gi spyi bo'i du ba ni //
T02D3703:339a-45: mi mthong ba ni de nas bskyod pa yin //
T02D3703:339a-46: nyin mtshan mtshams kyi rtags ni go bya ba //
T02D3703:339a-47: tshigs por byas nas bor ba de yi ni//
T02D3703:339b-0: @339b dkar nag dang ni gser gyi mdog can te //
T02D3703:339b-1: rman can gyi ni zla dang nyi mig go //
T02D3703:339b-2: zla dang nyi ma'i mig gi snying por ni //
T02D3703:339b-3: go bu'i gzugs brnyan snang bar mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D3703:339b-4: so rtsa'i bdud rtsi dag ni mi 'dzag na //
T02D3703:339b-5: phung po'i zhing las rlung de bskyod pa yin //
T02D3703:339b-6: sna ni rang gi gnas nas g-yogs pa dang //
T02D3703:339b-7: mig ni mchims dkrugs dang shes pa g-yengs //
T02D3703:339b-8: kha yi rlung ni chu la bab pa dang //
T02D3703:339b-9: sna skad du ni smra ba gang yin pa'o //
T02D3703:339b-10: rlung gi yon tan gyi rab tu dbye ba'o //
T02D3703:339b-11: lus kyi cha ni gang la rma mthong ba //
T02D3703:339b-12: de 'dra de ru 'pho bar byed pa ste //
T02D3703:339b-13: mi bzad dus kyi dbang du byas pa yin //
T02D3703:339b-14: rna ba'i rgyab tu ri mo dma' ba snang //
T02D3703:339b-15: rmas pa'i sa ru sbal rgyab ltar mtho yis //
T02D3703:339b-16: dug gis zin pa de ni mi 'tsho'o //
T02D3703:339b-17: khrag ni sna tshogs mdog tu 'dzag byed cing //
T02D3703:339b-18: de ni bya rog rkang 'dra'i gzugs su snang //
T02D3703:339b-19: mgrin pa 'phongs tshos gsang ba dang ni gnad ;
T02D3703:339b-20: / mig dang rna ba lag sor rnams kyi rtse //
T02D3703:339b-21: lte ba bshang lam phrag pa rked par ni //
T02D3703:339b-22: zin pa bsod nams kyis ni 'tsho ba yin //
T02D3703:339b-24: gang gi khyim gyi tha snyad ma he dang //
T02D3703:339b-25: bong bu dang ni rnga mo zhon pa yi //
T02D3703:339b-26: pho nya ltas ngan yin zhes su zhig smra //
T02D3703:339b-27: su la'ang de yis ltas ngan bskyed ma yin //
T02D3703:339b-28: ltas ngan bden par brjod pa 'di dag ste //
T02D3703:339b-29: yun rings shugs ni 'byin par byed pa dang //
T02D3703:339b-30: de bzhin du ni rdul dag byung ba dang //
T02D3703:339b-31: pho nya rigs gzhan dag ni yin pa dag / phal cher bsngags pa ma yin kho na ste //
T02D3703:339b-32: yan lag nyams dang thod pa can gyi gzugs //
T02D3703:339b-33: gos nag ngur smrig gyon pa nye bar na //
T02D3703:339b-34: pho nya'i mgo la mar nag byugs pa'am //
T02D3703:339b-35: yin na rdul gyi skabs la babs pa yin //
T02D3703:339b-36: rkang pa g-yas brkyang pa na 'tsho ba ste //
T02D3703:339b-37: phal cher bud med la ni mtshon pa'o //
T02D3703:339b-38: rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang bas skyes pa dag //
T02D3703:339b-39: srog ni 'gro ba yin par mtshon pa yin //
T02D3703:339b-40: rjes kyi dbyangs med de dang sbyar ba'am //
T02D3703:339b-41: yi ge phan tshun sbyar dang dang po ka //
T02D3703:339b-42: dris tshe nyon mongs tshig ni brjod pa na //
T02D3703:339b-43: rma can de ni the tshom med par 'chi //
T02D3703:339b-44: nyi mas rang gi gnas zhig bsregs nas ni //
T02D3703:340a-0: 'od zer rnon pos bsreg bzhin pa yis @340a * //
T02D3703:340a-2: / de bzhin mdun na mo la dud par 'thul //
T02D3703:340a-3: ltag ma rnams ni dge ba'i rnam pa yin //
T02D3703:340a-4: dgos pa la ni 'gro ched nyams pa dang //
T02D3703:340a-5: nyams bzhin pa dang nyams par 'gyur ba yi //
T02D3703:340a-6: phyogs gsum ma yin phyogs gzhan rnams su 'grub //
T02D3703:340a-7: sbrid pa bya rog k'a r'a yi dang ce sbyang gnyis //
T02D3703:340a-8: zangs dung la sogs sgra yi dus dang 'dzom pa na //
T02D3703:340a-9: nyon mongs srog ni 'gro tshe phyogs nas sgrogs //
T02D3703:340a-10: dri khur rjes 'brang rtog mkhas pho nya yi //
T02D3703:340a-11: gnyis ni bzang ngan dge dang mi dge dag / dug 'joms the tshom nyon mongs 'gro ba yi //
T02D3703:340a-12: bden pa 'di ni nges par mkhyen pa yin ;
T02D3703:340a-14: ma mo'i khyim mam padma can gyi mtsho //
T02D3703:340a-15: shing 'dzeg phug pa grog mkhar dag nas sam //
T02D3703:340a-16: khang rul dur khrod kyi ni lto 'phye rnams //
T02D3703:340a-17: chu'am bzhi mdo yi ni gdug pa can //
T02D3703:340a-18: drag po'i gza' la lto 'phye'i dug gis ni //
T02D3703:340a-19: 'dzin na bzhi'am bcu bzhi yin na 'jig //
T02D3703:340a-20: de bzhin cha ni rab nyams gnam stong dang //
T02D3703:340a-21: tshes brgyad la ni babs par gyur na'o //
T02D3703:340a-22: karti ka dang margha aa tra dang //
T02D3703:340a-23: b'a ra ni dang m'u la bi s'a kha //
T02D3703:340a-24: sle sha 'phur gsum gal te tshes dang gza' //
T02D3703:340a-25: rgyu skar la zin nges par brlag par 'gyur //
T02D3703:340a-26: bad mkhris rlung ni gtso bo mi dang ni //
T02D3703:340a-27: lto 'phye'i khams ni 'dra bar gyur pa na //
T02D3703:340a-28: de ltar shes na chos mi mthun pa dang //
T02D3703:340a-29: chos mthun pa yi dka' ba med la'ang yod //
T02D3703:340a-30: gnas dang tshes grangs dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'o //
T02D3703:340a-31: nyin mtshan thun phyed dag la klu rnams ni //
T02D3703:340a-32: gza' yi dbang gyur dag ni longs spyod de //
T02D3703:340a-33: nyin mo gang la de yi dus nyid de //
T02D3703:340a-34: mtshan mo sgo ni rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D3703:340a-35: 'byung po phyogs dus me dang ri bo dang //
T02D3703:340a-36: dus dang thar pa nyin mo'i dus su bsgreng //
T02D3703:340a-37: ro dus mig dang thub pa dang ni mda' //
T02D3703:340a-38: me dang zla ba mtshan mo dag tu shes //
T02D3703:340a-39: spen pa'i dus phyed snga ma bla ma yi //
T02D3703:340a-40: dang po 'das par dgos pa'i sa yin te //
T02D3703:340a-41: nyin mtshan 'pho ba'i mtshams ni gang yin pa //
T02D3703:340a-42: bcu drug po de rigs ldan dus yin no //
T02D3703:340a-43: gnyug ma'i lus la lta na nyi zla ste //
T02D3703:340a-44: lag pa rna ba la reg sa skyes yin //
T02D3703:340a-45: sna la lag pas reg na gza' lag go //
T02D3703:340b-0: mgrin pa la reg lha'i @340b bla ma'o //
T02D3703:340b-1: dbugs ni drug tu 'byin na pa ba sangs //
T02D3703:340b-2: dgod ban yang sben pa ru ni shes //
T02D3703:340b-3: sa la lta na sgra gcan nyid yin no //
T02D3703:340b-4: dus dang dgos pa'i dbye ba dang rags pa dang stong pa ste /
T02D3703:340b-5: dug zin gyi mtshon byed do //
T02D3703:340b-6: nyi zla sa sras gza' lag phur bu dang //
T02D3703:340b-7: pa ba sangs dang spen pas bskyed pa na ;
T02D3703:340b-8: / tshogs mig rgya mtsho ro dang bcu drug dang //
T02D3703:340b-9: sum cu gnyis dang lnga bcu tham pa ste //
T02D3703:340b-10: 'gro bas rang dbang can gyi lto 'phye'o //
T02D3703:340b-11: the tshom med pa de yang shes par bya //
T02D3703:340b-12: dgos pa dang ni bcas pa'i dug dag kyang //
T02D3703:340b-13: stong dang stong pa ma yin dbus su yang //
T02D3703:340b-14: srog rdul snying gi dbus su dal ba yis rnam par gsal ba yis ni legs gnas na //
T02D3703:340b-15: gnas na gnas pas de ma thag tu ni //
T02D3703:340b-16: yun ring brgyal ba la yang mtshon par bya //
T02D3703:340b-17: gnyis pa'i phyogs rtsa bstan pa'o //
T02D3703:340b-18: spyi bo dag ni nag po rlung yin te //
T02D3703:340b-19: mgrin pa lte bar me yi 'bar bas dkrigs //
T02D3703:340b-20: de nas dbang chen sor mo mkha' lding gi //
T02D3703:340b-21: pus mo nas brtsams chu ni dkar po yin //
T02D3703:340b-22: brgya byin gyis ni bdud rtsi phrogs nas kyang //
T02D3703:340b-23: rdo rje'i mtshon chas dgra med dga' ba yis //
T02D3703:340b-24: mkha' lding dgra ni reng par 'gyur ba dang //
T02D3703:340b-25: yid 'phrog thob pa de ni rgyal gyur cig //
T02D3703:340b-26: gar gyi dpal brjid gshog pas bskyod pa yi //
T02D3703:340b-27: rlung gi rigs kyi ri rnams bskyod byed pa //
T02D3703:340b-28: mkha' lding du ni yongs su bsgom bya ste //
T02D3703:340b-29: ma lus dug rnams zhi don gnyer bas so //
T02D3703:340b-30: rlung du bstan pas sems ni phur bus 'debs //
T02D3703:340b-31: 'bar ba yis ni spel bar byed pa yin //
T02D3703:340b-32: brgya byin gyis ni gsal por rengs par byed //
T02D3703:340b-33: chu zil 'bab pas dug ni brlag par byed//
T02D3703:340b-34: mkha' lding bye brag re re yis kyang ni //
T02D3703:340b-35: sel la nges par bsgom pa dang ldan na //
T02D3703:340b-36: bi med nga yis bzhin gnas su na //
T02D3703:340b-37: ma lus dug ni tshar gcod byed pa yin //
T02D3703:340b-38: aa sti bi sham brjod na dug yod de //
T02D3703:340b-39: na aa sti bi sham sa stengs kun na med //
T02D3703:340b-40: bsod nams yang dag bsags la mchog gi ni //
T02D3703:340b-41: de nyid 'di de skye ba kho nar 'gyur //
T02D3703:340b-42: lta byed mig gsum 'bar bas bstan pa yi //
T02D3703:340b-43: dug mchog thal ba ru ni brlag nas kyang //
T02D3703:340b-44: la la dag la gal te 'di skad du //
T02D3703:340b-45: mgrin sngon khyod brjod byin par gyur na ni //
T02D3703:340b-46: skyes bu de yi lus la ji srid ni //
T02D3703:340b-47: 'tsho ba'i bar du dug ni mi 'pho ste //
T02D3703:341a-2: nam du yang ni srid par 'gyur ram ci //
T02D3703:341a-3: gal te 'phrog byed kha sna bkag go myur bar ni //
T02D3703:341a-4: dga' ba'i mthar zhugs srog lung 'gro bzhin pa //
T02D3703:341a-5: re zhig gsal bar 'gul bar gyur na ni //
T02D3703:341a-6: rmas pa de ni 'tsho bar shes par bya //
T02D3703:341a-7: 'byung ba'i rlung ni nang du rngubs nas su //
T02D3703:341a-8: 'phrog byed kyi ni kha drung ji bzhin lta //
T02D3703:341a-9: skye bo'i dgra ni dben pa'i gnas su ni //
T02D3703:341a-10: sbas pa'i yul la yang ni shes par bya //
T02D3703:341a-11: the tshom mam ni dge dang mi dge ba //
T02D3703:341a-12: 'dri mi 'dra lhag dug gis brgyal ba la //
T02D3703:341a-13: phyis na pho nya'i gos ni phrogs byed ni //
T02D3703:341a-14: khru yis bcal ba la ni snang bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:341a-15: mkha' lding gshog tshogs gar dang ldan pa yis //
T02D3703:341a-16: klu gzugs de la rnam par gnon pa na //
T02D3703:341a-17: de ltar gang gson skad cig tsam gyis ni //
T02D3703:341a-18: gsal por smra ba dang ni bskyod par 'gyur //
T02D3703:341a-19: kha dang sna rlung rgyu ba bkag nas ni //
T02D3703:341a-20: skad cig tsam gyis de ni khyad par du //
T02D3703:341a-21: gdengs ka can gyis bzung nas brgyal ba ni //
T02D3703:341a-22: nges pa nyid du tshor ba dang bcas 'gyur //
T02D3703:341a-23: dug 'joms byed pa padma rgyas par dang //
T02D3703:341a-24: srog gi rlung gis kyang ni byed pa ste //
T02D3703:341a-25: yang dag 'gag pa'i 'gro ba'i snying po ni //
T02D3703:341a-26: slob dpon gyis ni sgom par byed pa yin //
T02D3703:341a-27: dug gi skyon ni med pa kho nar yang//
T02D3703:341a-28: gang dag gis ni rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis //
T02D3703:341a-29: brgyal bar byas la mkhas pas sen mtshams su //
T02D3703:341a-30: sen mo yis ni song bar byed pa yin //
T02D3703:341a-31: dug zin gyis ni bsod nams sbyor ba yi //
T02D3703:341a-32: gang la thig le dkar po byung gyur na //
T02D3703:341a-33: de la gang dang gang gis brjod byas pa //
T02D3703:341a-34: de dang de ni sngags su 'gyur pa yin //
T02D3703:341a-35: lus kyi yan lag dag ni dkar po la //
T02D3703:341a-36: gang gi gnas der me ni 'bar ba dag / drag po yi ni rlung gis bskyod pa na //
T02D3703:341a-37: rmas pa de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:341a-38: lhag ma nor bu'i gdengs ka'i 'dab ma'i rtsar //
T02D3703:341a-39: sred med bu bzhin rma can bde bar nyal//
T02D3703:341a-40: 'o ma'i mtsho yi bdud rtsi dkar po yis //
T02D3703:341a-41: bsgos pas dug ni 'joms par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D3703:341a-42: gang gi lus ni dkar por sgyur byed pa'i //
T02D3703:341a-43: thig le dkar po dag ni lta byed na //
T02D3703:341a-44: stong pa de yi dug ni stong par ni //
T02D3703:341a-45: bsgom pas kyang ni zhi bar shes par bya //
T02D3703:341a-46: 'phrog byed mig gi me ni 'bar ba dag /
T02D3703:341b-0: rang gis @341b bskyod pa gang gi snying la ni
T02D3703:341b-1: // rab tu 'bar bas rma ni rnying pa la //
T02D3703:341b-2: yud tsam gyis ni de la rgyas par bskyed //
T02D3703:341b-3: rigs ldan nor gyis 'byor dang yon tan can //
T02D3703:341b-4: dka' thub snying stobs can dang rgan po dang //
T02D3703:341b-5: bud med mngal ni rab tu rgyas pa dang //
T02D3703:341b-6: bram ze dang ni byis la bskyed mi bya //
T02D3703:341b-7: mkha' lding ser pos dug zin dag la ni //
T02D3703:341b-8: thig le yis ni gal te mnan pa dang //
T02D3703:341b-9: bum pa can gyi nyin zhag mang por yang //
T02D3703:341b-10: ri rab kyis ni mnan bzhin g-yo ba med //
T02D3703:341b-11: dug gis zin pa nor rgyas dkar po yis //
T02D3703:341b-12: mjug mas mgul bar bcings te mi lhung ba //
T02D3703:341b-13: de yi mgo las gal te bzung na ni //
T02D3703:341b-14: shang shang nam mkha' la ni 'gro na yang //
T02D3703:341b-15: zla ba'i zhing du son pa'i nus pa ni //
T02D3703:341b-16: snying ga'i padma phug nas pad skud 'dra'i //
T02D3703:341b-17: 'dzag pa gang la zag med bltas nas ni //
T02D3703:341b-18: de yi lus la dug ni gang la ste //
T02D3703:341b-19: gang phyir ga ma'i lus las nus pa ni //
T02D3703:341b-20: 'dzags pa yis ni rgyang ring gnas pa yis //
T02D3703:341b-21: ma lus dug kyang phig nas nges par ni //
T02D3703:341b-22: zhi bar byed pa kho na yin pa'o //
T02D3703:341b-25: // /'dab ma dkar po rab rgyas rab 'dzag pa'i //
T02D3703:341b-26: kha ba'i 'od 'dra chu shel nor bu'i gzugs //
T02D3703:341b-27: mi bzad dug kyang dang po'i dbyangs kyis ni //
T02D3703:341b-28: bsgoms pas yang dang yang du 'joms par byed pa yin //
T02D3703:341b-29: lag pa g-yon du dbang phyug spyi bo'i rgyan //
T02D3703:341b-30: dbus gnas drug pa la ni thig les brgyan //
T02D3703:341b-31: dbyangs ni dug rnams sdud par byed pa ste //
T02D3703:341b-32: 'phrog byed dkar po'i khu tshur bcangs pas so //
T02D3703:341b-33: sa 'og spyi bor zla ba'i dum bu ni ;
T02D3703:341b-34: / thig le dang bcas skra ris spyi nag stong //
T02D3703:341b-35: au yig gi ni dbyangs la zhon pa ste //
T02D3703:341b-36: 'phrog byed dkar po dug mthar byed pa yin //
T02D3703:341b-37: spong ba dang ni gos dag 'phrog pa dang //
T02D3703:341b-38: dug bcings cho lo ston mo sa yi 'og ;
T02D3703:341b-39: / ji ltar nges par bsgoms pas byed pa na //
T02D3703:341b-40: de ltar dgod pa yang ni shes par gyis //
T02D3703:341b-41: 'gro ba dug gis brgyal ba dag la yang //
T02D3703:341b-42: snying gar yang ni mgo med dkar po ste //
T02D3703:341b-43: gzhan dag kyang ni brgyal bar byed pa na //
T02D3703:341b-44: drag po'i rlung gis bskyod me 'bar bas so //
T02D3703:341b-45: sa 'og gos gnas rlung gis drangs pa na //
T02D3703:341b-46: skad cig gis ni phyed tsam gyis kyang ni //
T02D3703:342a-2: gting bzhin 'brangs nas 'ded par byed pa yin //
T02D3703:342a-3: nyon mongs snying gar chud pa'i mi shigs pas //
T02D3703:342a-4: bkug ba'i dug gi gong bu nag po ni //
T02D3703:342a-5: kum pa dkar bcas gos ni bcings pa yis //
T02D3703:342a-6: nyin zhag mang por yang ni g-yo ba med //
T02D3703:342a-7: tshes bzhi sprin nag lha yi bla ma dang //
T02D3703:342a-8: zla nyi pa ba sangs ni chol shing ste //
T02D3703:342a-9: rtsis kyi ri mo glog ni 'gyur ba dang //
T02D3703:342a-10: gang por cho lor skar ma'i tshogs su ste //
T02D3703:342a-11: chos skur lag pa dbang phyug bzhin pa'i mig / cho lo mkhan po gnyis skyes mchog gi tshogs //
T02D3703:342a-12: dug zin dug las yongs su thar nas ni //
T02D3703:342a-13: chol res la ne lag nas yongs su 'dzin //
T02D3703:342a-14: de yis dug gis bzung ba'i skyes bu ni //
T02D3703:342a-15: rnam par dag pas skad cig khyad par 'phags //
T02D3703:342a-16: bza' ba zos pa'i lhag ma'i dus su ni //
T02D3703:342a-17: chu snod bzung nas chu ni ster bar byed //
T02D3703:342a-18: gang zhig mthong dang thos dang gang zhig ni //
T02D3703:342a-19: nyams su myong ba'ang yul byas spyod pa ni ;
T02D3703:342a-20: / de kun sems kyis byed do gus par gyis //
T02D3703:342a-21: srid pa'i dngos po med pa 'byung ba yis //
T02D3703:342a-22: de bzhin du ni na ra yas smras pa //
T02D3703:342a-23: nus pa gang gis myur du thar skyed dang //
T02D3703:342a-24: des ni dug dang 'byung po 'joms byed de //
T02D3703:342a-25: zla ba dang ni nyi mar zhugs pa na'o //
T02D3703:342a-26: 'dus pa'i skye bo kha yi sbubs nas ni //
T02D3703:342a-27: nus pa ba mo lta bu bab pa yis //
T02D3703:342a-28: dgod pa'i sgra yis dug dag myur du ni //
T02D3703:342a-29: 'joms par byed de bsgoms pa byas pas so //
T02D3703:342a-30: dug zin smra bas gal te yod pa na //
T02D3703:342a-31: rgyang ring na yang dug ni myur du sdud //
T02D3703:342a-32: snying gar ngang ba dkar po bsgom pa ni //
T02D3703:342a-33: bdud rtsi'i snying pos yongs su rgyas pa'o //
T02D3703:342a-34: brtan pa'i dug ni khur bu stong phrag kyang //
T02D3703:342a-35: rlung gis bsdus pas dug med par ni byed //
T02D3703:342a-36: ngang pa'i bdung rtsi 'bab par gyur pa ni //
T02D3703:342a-37: zla ba'i zhing nas byung bas der 'gyur ro //
T02D3703:342a-38: lto ba spyi bo spyi gtsug go cha ni //
T02D3703:342a-39: mig dang lag pa lag sor sgra ldan pas //
T02D3703:342a-40: re re bor ba'i ring po tsheg drag kyang //
T02D3703:342a-41: drug po yang ni blang bar bya ba yin //
T02D3703:342a-42: nyi ma'i grangs kyi dbyangs ni sbyar bya ste //
T02D3703:342a-43: sa mchog srid pa dmigs pa med pas 'god //
T02D3703:342a-44: de ni drag po dang mnyam tshig btsan zhing //
T02D3703:342a-45: dug 'joms mi byed pa ni ma yin no //
T02D3703:342a-46: sa mchog ra la bskyon pa gug rings dang /
T02D3703:342b-0: @342b zla phyed thig le yis ni mdzes par byas //
T02D3703:342b-1: mar gyi nying khus mdzes pa bsgoms nas ni //
T02D3703:342b-2: go nas yi dug ni sel bar byed //
T02D3703:342b-3: gang zhig 'bum phrag bdun ni bzlas pa yis //
T02D3703:342b-4: bi na ya yi bu bzhin sbrul dug bzod //
T02D3703:342b-5: mi bzlog snyan dngags mkhan gyi rgyal por ni //
T02D3703:342b-6: dbyangs can gyi ni nus pa bsgom pa na'o //
T02D3703:342b-7: de nyid tsheg drag dang bcas 'char ka yi //
T02D3703:342b-8: 'od kyis dkrigs pa'i skyes bu gang zhig gis //
T02D3703:342b-9: sgom par byed na dug dang mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D3703:342b-10: gdengs ka can yang khro zhing 'khrugs par byed //
T02D3703:342b-11: snying la bsgoms pa yis ni 'gugs pa ste //
T02D3703:342b-12: dbral ba'i mthil du gnas pa dbang du sdud //
T02D3703:342b-13: yan lag mchog la btsud pas chang gi rgyun //
T02D3703:342b-14: dzu ba ti la 'bab pa kho nar 'gyur //
T02D3703:342b-15: kha yi sbubs su 'bar bas dkrigs pa yi //
T02D3703:342b-16: sum sdom rab tu 'bar bas dug brgyal ba //
T02D3703:342b-17: 'chi ba'am ni 'tsho ba yang ni rung //
T02D3703:342b-18: bde bar gsal po nyid du de yis smra //
T02D3703:342b-19: de nyid dha yi nang du chung gyur cing //
T02D3703:342b-20: padma'i lte bar gnas pa bsgoms na ni //
T02D3703:342b-21: bdud rtsi'i zil ba dal 'bab tsheg drag bcas //
T02D3703:342b-22: dug 'joms pa yi sa bon nyid yin no //
T02D3703:342b-23: de nyid me yi nang du bzhag nas ni //
T02D3703:342b-24: nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras mngon gsal dkrigs //
T02D3703:342b-25: nges par dug sel rims dang 'byung po dang //
T02D3703:342b-26: dug gi khyad par yang ni sel bar byed //
T02D3703:342b-27: kasha sbyar ba dkar po thig ler bcas //
T02D3703:342b-28: ri dags mtshan ma'i dbus su chud pa ni //
T02D3703:342b-29: snying la chud par byas pas dug rnams ni /
T02D3703:342b-30: myur du 'joms par byed pa kho na yin //
T02D3703:342b-31: dbyangs yig a'u ring yang dag ldan pa yi //
T02D3703:342b-32: yi ge de nyid mi yi seng ge'i steng //
T02D3703:342b-33: 'jigs dang sgra dang sdig dang dug dang ni //
T02D3703:342b-34: 'byung po nad dang dbul po brlag par byed //
T02D3703:342b-35: yi ge h'um phat me yi rang bzhin can //
T02D3703:342b-36: 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pas gsal byas pa //
T02D3703:342b-37: gang gis mgrin par bris pa yin na ni //
T02D3703:342b-38: de yis gsal por don grub byed par 'gyur //
T02D3703:342b-39: la yig mchog ni zlum po'i thig ler bcas //
T02D3703:342b-40: gos gnas bdud rtsi dkar po rgyun 'dzag pa //
T02D3703:342b-41: dug gis zin la byab tu bcug na ni //
T02D3703:342b-42: nges par dug ni 'joms par byed pa yin //
T02D3703:342b-43: dri khur nag po'i dbus chud tha yig ni //
T02D3703:342b-44: sngags 'dis dug zin la ni byin brlabs na //
T02D3703:342b-45: bskyod dang smra dang gzer ba'i sgra dang ni //
T02D3703:342b-46: langs nas kun du lta bar the tshom //
T02D3703:343a-1: / gsum pa nye bar bstan pa'o /
T02D3703:343a-3: // / dzham k'a ri ni ku ru kulle dang //
T02D3703:343a-4: be runna dang gser ri sa bon dag / gang du dug gis brgyal la byed pa yi //
T02D3703:343a-5: dbye ba der ni legs par mnyan par gyis //
T02D3703:343a-6: saddo b'a ma gho ra de skyes bu //
T02D3703:343a-7: lnga pa de ru y'a ni dbang ldan du //
T02D3703:343a-8: dkar ser dmar ljang nam mkha' sor mor gnas //
T02D3703:343a-9: rgan lcugs gung mo gsum la dzham k'a ri //
T02D3703:343a-10: yi ge rnam par spras pa dag yin no //
T02D3703:343a-11: bzhi pa lha ni ni yig ces bya ba //
T02D3703:343a-12: ming med la ni gnas pa nyid yin no //
T02D3703:343a-13: mkhar gnas dha dang wa sbyar thig ler bcas //
T02D3703:343a-14: dug zin ming yig dang por bar du ste //
T02D3703:343a-15: rgan po'i sngags dang sbyar ba dag gis ni //
T02D3703:343a-16: dbang ldan de ni mnyes na ma lus pa'i //
T02D3703:343a-17: dug ni de yi mod la zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D3703:343a-18: de yi skyes bu dang ni sbyar ba na //
T02D3703:343a-19: 'byung po'i gnod pa yod na mngon gsal 'gyur //
T02D3703:343a-20: 'jigs pa'i gho ri dang ni sbyar ba na //
T02D3703:343a-21: dgra sbrul dman pa yang ni mod la bskyod //
T02D3703:343a-22: g-yon pa mnan pas rengs pa phongs pa dang //
T02D3703:343a-23: dgra dang ngag dang dug dang dpung dag go //
T02D3703:343a-24: lug g-yon zla ba'i dbus gnas tha yig chud //
T02D3703:343a-25: dzham mnyes dkar po 'dzag par byas nas ni //
T02D3703:343a-26: 'od dang cha kun rdzogs pa de yis ni //
T02D3703:343a-27: dug dang lu ba rims 'bras mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D3703:343a-28: gdon dang 'byung po'i gnod dang tsha ba dang /
T02D3703:343a-29: nges par zhi byed yongs su bzlas pa'i chus //
T02D3703:343a-30: sngags pas 'gro ba rnams la de byed do //
T02D3703:343a-31: kha la dzham yig lkog mar k'a yin no //
T02D3703:343a-32: lte bar ri yig gsang ni rkang gnyis dhvam //
T02D3703:343a-33: mda' dang nyungs kar rma bya'i sgro sogs kyis //
T02D3703:343a-34: 'byung po la sogs gnod pa 'joms byed de //
T02D3703:343a-35: dung sogs sgra la'ang lan bdun bzlas pas so //
T02D3703:343a-36: 'bum bzlas sbyin sreg khri yis mchod gtang dang //
T02D3703:343a-37: tsan tis aom khi la la ku yin te //
T02D3703:343a-38: ru ni lkog mar ku ni nu brag tu //
T02D3703:343a-39: lle ni gsang bar rkang gnyis sv'a h'a'o //
T02D3703:343a-40: stong bzlas skud par btab ba rna bar btags //
T02D3703:343a-41: de ni nags su sbrul gyis mi 'jigs so //
T02D3703:343a-42: sa gar sogs bris khyim gzhag de mi 'ong //
T02D3703:343a-43: bi ri ma h'a se na tsa na ra dang //
T02D3703:343a-44: tsan tis 'bum bdun re res dbang kun 'grub //
T02D3703:343a-45: aom su warna re khe kukku ta bi kri ha r'u pi ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3703:343a-46: lag mthil pad dkar 'dab brgyad dbus su ni //
T02D3703:343a-47: yi ge 'dren pa gzhan la gnyis gnyis brtsegs //
T02D3703:343b-0: @343b ba mo 'bab pas sman ma la bsangs na /
T02D3703:343b-1: ras bal 'dab ma rlung gis bskyod bzhin ldang //
T02D3703:343b-3: bhe runde a'a a'i a'u ba'i dze //
T02D3703:343b-6: h'um ka re bi sha na se th'a bar dzam
T02D3703:343b-7: ga ma aa ga dza kitta ma h'a ra ta
T02D3703:343b-11: shi siddha n'a th'a di b'a ka ri aadzny'a shr'i shr'iskantha shr'i n'i la kantha /
T02D3703:343b-13: ri mi dz'i mi ham sa /
T02D3703:343b-14: kshi pi kshi pi ham sa h'um ham sa /
T02D3703:343b-15: dzam ham sa n'atti bi shi /
T02D3703:343b-18: 'brum bu gnyis dang dug zin la sogs pa //
T02D3703:343b-19: gso dang sngar gsungs bla ma'i man ngag bzhin //
T02D3703:343b-20: sngags chab ji tsam 'gro ba'i lam de na //
T02D3703:343b-21: dug sel byed par yid la gdon mi za //
T02D3703:343b-22: pad steng bum bca' sngags bdun bzlas klu mchod //
T02D3703:343b-24: zhes bya ba dang rig pa'i rgyal mo drug / sgra ris zla dkyil lag mthil bsam pas kyang //
T02D3703:343b-25: dug sel bya rgod bshad pa mthong ba dang //
T02D3703:343b-26: skye bo'i skyid sdug bde ba'i sgra yis kyang //
T02D3703:343b-27: tsha gsum po la'i sa bon sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T02D3703:343b-28: snar blugs lus skyes sogs kyi nad 'joms byed //
T02D3703:343b-29: tsher can shing sha'i rnga la ni //
T02D3703:343b-30: kha gnyis pags pas rnga g-yogs byas //
T02D3703:343b-31: sbrul dgra'i rkang gis brdungs nas ni //
T02D3703:343b-32: ji srid sgras khyab de dug 'joms //
T02D3703:343b-33: pha ni dza dang su darsha na lus btags kyang //
T02D3703:343b-34: she te pu nar na ba'i khu blud pas //
T02D3703:343b-35: ma ning ka ko ti yi tsa //
T02D3703:343b-36: ba mar dang 'thungs dug gsum sel //
T02D3703:343b-37: kanta shir sha'i rtsa shun 'bras bkrus chur //
T02D3703:343b-38: sbyar ba aa sha ra yi nya dag la //
T02D3703:343b-39: 'thungs na lo gcig dug ni thub pa yin //
T02D3703:343b-40: shu dag shing kun nim pa'i khu ba dag / snar blugs dug gis skra rtse slebs kyang sel //
T02D3703:343b-41: ka ranydza yi tsher can nimpa'i 'dab //
T02D3703:343b-42: mar sbrang yungs kar go nas yang sel //
T02D3703:343b-43: kha gnyis lus che ne'u le yi mig //
T02D3703:343b-44: sbrul dgra'i mkhris pa'i cha mnyam pa //
T02D3703:343b-45: khyim du gzhag pas kyang ni sbrul mgo 'gegs //
T02D3703:343b-50: l'aksha bha l'a l'a ta ka /
T02D3703:343b-55: 'di dag cha mnyam du ba yis //
T02D3703:343b-56: lus skyes tse ri sbrang ma sogs //
T02D3703:343b-57: sbrul yang 'bros zhes klu sgrub gsung //
T02D3703:344a-0: @344a * // me tog grong khyer zhes bya ba //
T02D3703:344a-1: brgya byin pho brang dang mnyam par //
T02D3703:344a-2: zla cha zhes bya'i bram ze me'i //
T02D3703:344a-3: lo rgyus kyang ni lnga pa yin //
T02D3703:344a-4: dpal mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos bram ze shang kus mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3703:344a-6: 'dir ni bla ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs te //
T02D3703:344a-7: dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis mdor bsdus bris //
T02D3703:344a-8: dge ba de yis srid gsum ma lus pa //
T02D3703:344a-9: dug med bdud rtsi'i go 'phang bsten par shog //
T02D3703:344a-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze aa ba dh'u t'i chen po dpe med kyi zhal sngar //
T02D3703:344a-11: lo ts'a ba bande pradzny'a k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
T02D3703:344a-13: // / dbang phyug chen pos mkha' lding du sprul nas /
T02D3703:344a-14: mkha' lding rgya mtsho ba 'bum phrag bzhi bshad /
T02D3703:344a-15: de bram ze sang kus dbang bskur gyi tshe klu bdud kyi dug yod pa la /
T02D3703:344a-16: 'jog po'i dug kham phor du mar dang sbrang rtsi
T02D3703:344a-17: byin pa ma yog / bdun po kun gyi bu
T02D3703:344a-18: mo nu mo bkug nas chung mar byas //
T02D3703:344a-19: 'jog po'i bu mo bkug pas mos phu byas dug gis zin nas shi la thug pas /
T02D3703:344a-20: yul mi kun gyis khyed grongs na nged kyi dug sus gso byas pas /
T02D3703:344a-21: mchod sdong tshugs shig zer nas /
T02D3703:344a-22: nam mkha' lding gi mchod sdong rdo rings steng du btsugs /
T02D3703:344a-23: steng nas rdo'i gdugs phub pa cig byas //
T02D3703:344a-25: kun dug zhi bar byed do //
T02D3703:344a-26: de lta bu'i shang kus mdzad do /
T02D3703:344a-28: // / dus dang dus ma yin pa la lnga ste /
T02D3703:344a-40: stong pa ste dug zin gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3703:344a-41: dus ma yin par mi 'chi ba bstan pa'o //
T02D3703:344a-43: phrin las thams cad kyi snod du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang /
T02D3703:344b-1: phyogs thams cad du grags pas khyab pa'o /
T02D3703:344b-9: / aom tsa kra ra hi tsa kra bhi da ni gha na ti k'a ri ham /
T02D3703:344b-10: sa gzhi lci bas mandal gru bzhi byug / dung
T02D3703:344b-11: dang bu cha bkrus la thub pa dang kha byang
T02D3703:344b-12: du bstan / rang yang kha byang du bltas la /
T02D3703:344b-13: dung la gu gul bdug / g-yas g-yon gang du 'khor 'dod pa de ngos su dung bskor /
T02D3703:344b-14: lag pa gnyis kyi bar du dung gzung /
T02D3703:344b-15: dung la kha gtad la sngags bzla //
T02D3703:344b-16: bu tsha'i mgo la me tog gtor //
